Click Here To Check Out Our Catering Menu & Party Options FRESH INGREDIENTS HAND TOSSED DOUGH PIZZA BY THE SLICE & MORE! ORDER ONLINE - VIEW MENU At Ray’s Pizza, our sauces and dough are made in-house daily, using the highest quality ingredients, including San Marzano tomatoes imported from Italy. Our pizzas are topped with fresh produce from local purveyors and superb meats. We also offer made-from-scratch Italian dishes for take-out and delivery. Chef/owner Kevin Ray has worked in and managed pizza restaurants for 20+ years. He is excited to bring his expertise to the James Island community! Our staff is trained to go above and beyond to make sure you have a quality experience, stop in soon to see us! Hosting an event or party? Please contact us at for your catering needs! 843.804.9900

0 Party & Catering menu Bring The Flavor of Ray’s Pizza To Your Next Event! Whether you’re planning a family gathering, office lunch, birthday party, or community event, let Ray's Pizza take care of the food with our delicious catering options. From hand-tossed pizzas and hearty pastas to fresh salads and sandwiches, our catering menu is packed with crowd-pleasers made from quality ingredients. We make it easy to feed a hungry group—so you can focus on enjoying the moment. Catering orders are customizable, so give us a call and we can create the perfect menu for your event. Please place catering orders at least 48 hours in advance 843-804-9900 Click To Email Click Here To Download Our Catering Menu & See Prices FRESH INGREDIENTS HAND TOSSED DOUGH WINGS-PIZZA-PASTA & MORE
